Description.enUS:
Summons Hybrid units.

Enables:
- Warriors

Tooltip.enUS: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить сооружение этого строения, уничтожив его и получив частичную компенсацию.

Tooltip.enUS: List of Hybrid air support units.
Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отправляет созданные войска в указанную точку. Рабочие, отправленные на месторождение минералов или веспена, автоматически начнут добычу ресурсов.

Tooltip.enUS: List of Hybrid ground units.
Teleport structure to target location over 14 seconds.
All units summoned by other Void Rifts will spawn at the **chosen Void Rift** and obey its rally point. This Void Rift takes 50% less damage from all sources
List of Hybrid air battle units.
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: List of Hybrid air support units.
General-purpose infantry.**Can attack ground and air units**
Ferocious annihilator of light units.**Can attack ground units**
Fast mobile unit. Can use Jump ability to move behind enemy.**Can attack ground units**
Long ranged support unit. Deals high damage to single targets and can use **Mace Strike** to deal area damage.**Can attack ground units**
Heavy surviving unit. Consumes Void energy to restore Protection shield.**Can attack ground units**
Powerful warrior. Persists cloaked while is powered by Void and can be quickly burrowed within Void power field.**Can attack ground and air units**
Ranged support unit. Consumes Void energy to increase attack damage.**Can attack ground and air units**
Strong support Void energy user. Can use Psionic Tornado to deal high damage and Time Warp to disable enemy units.**Can attack ground and air units**
Psionic monstrous Void energy user with high damage attacks. Can use **Psionic Orb** to deal area damage and **Confusion** to make enemy units weaker.**Can attack air and ground units**
Monstrous creature. Devastating melee attacks deal area damage. Can use **Consume DNA** to restore life and Protection shields.**Can attack ground units**
List of Hybrid ground units.
List of Hybrid air battle units.

Support air unit. Can restore Void energy to friendly units. Can use Disappearance to cloak allies.

Can attack ground and air units.
Support air unit. Can create empowered Void Power Field and Phase Out any unit or structure.
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: List of Hybrid ground units.

Flying transport. Can use **Interdimensional Overload** to teleport to any player unit.

Detector
List of Hybrid air support units.
List of Hybrid air battle units.
Fast air unit, can attack while moving. Can use Acceleration to increase movespeed.
Air unit. Consumes Void energy to became cloaked.**Can attack ground units**
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: List of Hybrid ground units.

Assault air unit. Consumes Void energy to deals splash damage to air units. Can use Void Chasm to ground air units.

Can attack and air units.
List of Hybrid air support units.
List of Hybrid air battle units.

Flagship air unit. Can consume Void energy to empower attack.

Can attack ground and air units.
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
